thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hersha Hospitality Trust Posts Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.48

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hersha Hospitality Trust Posts Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.48
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Hersha Hospitality Trust:
* ANNOUNCES FULL YEAR AND FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.48 * ‍Q4 2017 COMPARABLE PORTFOLIO REVPAR GROWTH OF 6.0%​ * SEES Q1 ‍NET INCOME PER SHARE $0.47 - $0.49​
* SEES ‍2018 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.89 TO $2.07​ * SEES ‍Q1 ADJUSTED FFO LOSS PER SHARE $0.03 TO ADJUSTED FFO LOSS PER SHARE $0.01​
* Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.43 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
